from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, year, month, weekofyear, to_timestamp, row_number, lit
from pyspark.sql.window import Window
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# === Spark session ===
spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("ECEVENTS_Transform").getOrCreate()

spark.conf.set("spark.sql.legacy.timeParserPolicy", "LEGACY")
spark.conf.set("spark.databricks.delta.schema.autoMerge.enabled", "true")


# Configure storage credentials (if needed)
# spark.conf.set(
#     "fs.azure.account.key.navispowerbidatastorage2.dfs.core.windows.net",
#     "<storage-account-key>"
# )

# Paths
input_path   = "abfss://cmsa@navispowerbidatastorage2.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/ecevents/load/"
output_path  = "abfss://cmsa@navispowerbidatastorage2.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/ecevents/"
archive_path = "abfss://cmsa@navispowerbidatastorage2.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/ecevents/archive/"

# Updated headers
headers = ["ecEventGkey","yardGkey","YardID","FcyID","cheKind","CHE_Name","CHE_ID","TimeStamp","eventType","eventSubType","eventTypeDescription","fromCheIdName","ToCheIdName","unit","pow","pool","workQueue","travelDistance","moveKind","isTwin","startDistance","unitRef","tran_ID","locType","locID","locSlot","opsPosID","unladenLoctype","unladenLocID","unladenLocSlot","ladenLoctype","ladenLocID","laden_LocSlot","operator_name"]

# Read CSV without header
df = spark.read.option("header", "false").option("delimiter", ",").csv(input_path)

# Apply updated headers
df = df.toDF(*headers)

# Add constant client_id
df = df.withColumn("client_id", lit("CMSA"))

# Convert TimeStamp to proper timestamp
df = df.withColumn("EcEventTime", to_timestamp(col("TimeStamp"), "dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm:ss"))

# Derive date parts
df = df.withColumn("Year", year(col("EcEventTime"))) \
       .withColumn("Month", month(col("EcEventTime"))) \
       .withColumn("Week", weekofyear(col("EcEventTime")))

# Window to get LAST row by EcEventTime
windowSpec = Window.partitionBy("ecEventGkey").orderBy(col("EcEventTime").desc())

df = df.withColumn("rn", row_number().over(windowSpec)) \
            .filter(col("rn") == 1) \
            .drop("rn")

# Write to Delta
# df_last.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(output_path)

# Check if Delta table already exists at the path
if DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, output_path):
    delta_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, output_path)

    (
        delta_table.alias("t")
        .merge(
            df.alias("s"),
            "t.ecEventGkey = s.ecEventGkey"  # match condition
        )
        .whenMatchedUpdateAll()  # update all columns on match
        .whenNotMatchedInsertAll()  # insert new row when not matched
        .execute()
    )
else:
    # First-time write
    (
        df.write
        .format("delta")
        .mode("overwrite")
        .save(output_path)
    )

# Move processed files to dated archive
# input_files = dbutils.fs.ls(input_path)
# for file_info in input_files:
#     file_name = file_info.name
#     dbutils.fs.mv(file_info.path, archive_path + file_name)

print("âœ… Transformation complete with updated headers, client_id added, and files archived.")
